activities:
IVS will be receiving information on clinical trial specimens from the EU for ongoing clinical trials. We also transfer customer/client information from the EU to the US.

Please see http://www.invivoscribe.com/pages/privacy-policy merely for website privacy policy data collection policies, but see the “EU Safe Harbor Privacy Policy” link at the bottom of the page for European/Safe Harbor privacy policy statement which is relevant to this certification and contact information.
